function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Possibility of virus transmission via contaminated surfaces","Impact":"Increased risk of infection and spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Implementing touchless technologies for everyday use to minimize contact with surfaces","Technologies":"Touchless technologies such as keycard swiping, voice control, and face recognition","People":"Residents, visitors, and building occupants","Owner":"Building owners, developers, and technology providers"},{"Description":"Strain on health systems during unexpected situations like pandemics","Impact":"Overwhelmed health systems and inability to provide necessary care","Mitigation":"Implementing innovative technologies for remote health monitoring and care, and creating safe conditions within residences","Technologies":"Automated health monitoring systems, remote health care technologies, and smart home technologies","People":"Residents, especially those in need of regular medical care","Owner":"Healthcare providers, technology developers, and building owners"},{"Description":"Inability to visit hospitals or healthcare facilities due to lockdowns","Impact":"Limited access to necessary medical care and services","Mitigation":"Creating safe and healthy conditions within residences, implementing remote health monitoring, and providing access to telemedicine services","Technologies":"Smart home technologies, remote health monitoring systems, and telemedicine platforms","People":"Residents who require medical care","Owner":"Healthcare providers, technology developers, and building owners"}]}
